  14. (**************************************************************************)

  16. ‌type 'a t = {mutable next : int ; mutable data : 'a array}

  18. ‌let default_size = 32

  20. ‌let create x = {next = 0 ; data = Array.make default_size x}
  21. and reset t = t.next <- 0

  23. ‌let incr_table table new_size =
  24.   let t = Array.make new_size table.data.(0) in
  25.   Array.blit table.data 0 t 0 (Array.length table.data) ;
  26.   table.data <- t

  28. ‌let emit table i =
  29. let size = Array.length table.data in
  30. if table.next >= size then
  31.     incr_table table (2*size);
  32. table.data.(table.next) <- i ;
  33. table.next <- table.next + 1


  36. exception Error

  38. ‌let get t i =
  39.   if 0 <= i && i < t.next then
  40.     t.data.(i)
  41.   else
  42.     raise Error

  44. ‌let trim t =
  45.   let r = Array.sub t.data 0 t.next in
  46.   reset t ;
  47.   r

  49. ‌let iter t f =
  50.   let size = t.next
  51.   and data = t.data in
  52.   for i = 0 to size-1 do
  53.     f data.(i)
  54.   done

  56. ‌let size t = t.next
